source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a large, brightly lit Ferris wheel at night. The wheel is adorned with yellow and red lights, creating a mesmerizing, symmetrical pattern against the dark sky. The shot captures the wheel in motion from a head-on perspective.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot of a large, brightly lit Ferris wheel at night. The wheel is adorned with yellow and red lights, creating a mesmerizing, symmetrical pattern against the dark sky. The shot captures the wheel in motion from a head-on perspective.

generated_critique: The caption fails to describe the subject's motion with sufficient detail, stating only that the wheel is "in motion." It should specify that the brightly lit Ferris wheel rotates counter-clockwise from a head-on perspective. The caption also includes the subjective adjective "mesmerizing," which should be removed. Furthermore, the description of the wheel's appearance ("large, brightly lit," "adorned with yellow and red lights," "symmetrical pattern") is overly detailed and should be condensed to better adhere to the instruction to focus on motion. The introductory phrase "This is a scenery shot of" is unnecessary.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: From a head-on perspective, a brightly lit Ferris wheel with yellow and red lights rotates counter-clockwise against the dark night sky.
